data: `minecraft:behavior.random_look_around_and_sit` allows an entity to sit in place and look around in different directions.

data.Name: max_look_count
data.Description: The max amount of unique looks a mob will have while looking around.

data.Name: max_look_time
data.Description: The max amount of time (in ticks) a mob will stay looking at a direction while looking around.

data.Name: min_look_count
data.Description: The min amount of unique looks a mob will have while looking around.

data.Name: min_look_time
data.Description: The min amount of time (in ticks) a mob will stay looking at a direction while looking around.

data.Name: probability
data.Description: The probability of randomly looking around/sitting.
